question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. Widow Remarriage Act - Lord Dalhousie
  2. First to attempt decentralization of financial administration - Lord Mayo
  3. Chairman of the Indian Education Commission of 1882 - Dr. M.E. Sadler
   Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: Widow Remarriage Act was passed by Lord Dalhousie in 1856. First to attempt decentralization of financial administration was taken by Lord Mayo in 1870. The chairman of the Indian Education Commission of 1882 which was appointed by Lord Ripon was Sir Willium Hunter. Lord Ripon appointed the Indian Education Commission on 3rd February 1882, with Sir William Hunter as its Chairman.
